name: Drainpipe Gargoyle
description: The Drainpipe Gargoyle resembles a typical statue when motionless, possessing a rugged texture and elemental features that hint at its water-based nature. It has robust limbs suited for both melee and ranged attacks.
memorable: Unique ability to use False Appearance to blend in and strikes from the air with powerful water-based attacks.
goals: Typically serves as a guardian of areas near water and engages in ambush tactics.
relations: Often found among other elementals or gargoyles, might serve water-themed beings.
environment: Commonly located in damp, water-rich environments or ruins near water sources.
strengths: Immunities to poison and various conditions make it resilient in combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks and average Dexterity limit agility.
attacks: Employs multiattack with claw and bite attacks, and uses a powerful water spit attack for area control.
most_powerful_ability: Spit ability allows for area damage and can manipulate enemy positioning.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet and a passive Perception score of 14.
skills: Possesses proficiency in perception, making it very aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Can fly at a speed of 60 feet for mobility.
Resistant to nonmagical slashing and piercing damage.
Does not require air, food, or sleep due to its elemental nature.
Effective ambusher with the False Appearance ability.
Utilizes height advantage for more lethal claw attacks.
test_queries: elemental creature that disguises as statue
monster immune to poison and fatigue
gargoyle that attacks with claws and spit
